text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Provides all the Internet banking functionality to customers via their web browser

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Provides a limited subset of the Internet banking functionality to customers via their mobile device

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Delivers the static content and the Internet banking SPA

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Stores user registration information, hashed auth credentials, access logs, etc.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Provides Internet banking functionality via API
